message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product.  Given its value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm proposing a starting price of $1,800,000.  I believe this reflects its true worth.

I appreciate the unique opportunity to acquire this product, but $1,800,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for the product. I believe this price reflects its value while also being mindful of my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,400,000 undervalues the unique benefits this product offers. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,600,000?  I'm confident this price represents a fair deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1,600,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,500,000 for the product. I believe this price reflects its value while also being mindful of my budget.
